messages.title: Bring Back Simon
messages.content: Simon served as our MP for 32 years. He worked tirelessly for local people and fought for liberal values.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Simon will fight for genuinely affordable housing.
Simon will fight for local jobs and services.
Simon will fight for people to have the final say on the final Brexit deal negotiated by the Government.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Two years ago, many people in Bermondsey and Old Southwark were saddened to see a Labour MP elected. On 8th June we have a chance to bring Simon back.

community.content: Simon led the campaign to save Guy’s Hospital. He won the fight for Bermondsey and Southwark stations on the Jubilee Line. He has kept fighting for genuinely affordable homes, not luxury flats for overseas investors. And he helped thousands of individual residents, instead of worrying about internal political party battles.

politicalExperience.achievements: Led the campaign to save Guy’s Hospital. Won the fight for Bermondsey and Southwark stations on the Jubilee Line. Fought for genuinely affordable homes.

examples: Simon served as our MP for 32 years. He worked tirelessly for local people and fought for liberal values.

Simon led the campaign to save Guy’s Hospital. He won the fight for Bermondsey and Southwark stations on the Jubilee Line. He has kept fighting for genuinely affordable homes, not luxury flats for overseas investors. And he helped thousands of individual residents, instead of worrying about internal political party battles.
Simon will fight for people to have the final say on the final Brexit deal negotiated by the Government.
